# Tutorials

You can try our previous tutorials by looking at the [Documentation](../Documentation.qmd) page, or **try a workshop** one of us have been giving at the scVerse 2024 conference in Munich. The workshop is about **dimensionality reduction methods for single cell data** and contains a jupyter notebook to run python code on Google Colab.
